product_name: Oakley Swim Dawn Patrol Long Triangle Bikini Top - Women's
long_description: From surfing at sunrise to evening bonfires on the beach, the Oakley Dawn Patrol Long Triangle Bikini Top stays comfortable all day long so you can keep your focus on having fun. Stretchy nylon fabric with stretch-polyester lining allows easy movement; removable molded cups add shape. UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Oakley Dawn Patrol Long Triangle Bikini Top features cross-back straps for extra support and athletic style.
short_description: From surfing at sunrise to evening bonfires on the beach, the Oakley Dawn Patrol Long Triangle Bikini Top stays comfortable all day long so you can keep your focus on having fun.
